No [2] trains between Chambers St, Manhattan and Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr, Brooklyn
[4] [A] [N] [Q] trains provide alternate service


[2] service operates in two sections:
 1. Between 241 St and Chambers St and via the [1] to/from South Ferry
 • Trains run local in both directions between 96 St and Chambers St.
2. Between Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr and Flatbush Av
• Trains from Flatbush Av skip Eastern Pkwy, Grand Army Plaza and Bergen St.

Travel Alternatives:
For service between Manhattan and Brooklyn take the [4] [N] [Q] or [R].

For Park Place, Fulton, Wall, Clark Sts, Borough Hall, Hoyt and Nevins Sts,
use nearby [4] [A] [C] [N] [R] stations.

• Transfer between trains at 59 St-Columbus Circle [2] [A], Times Sq-42 St/Port Authority
[2] [A] [N] [Q] or Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr [4] [N] [Q] [R].
• Transfer between [1] [2] and [R] ([N] after 11:30 PM) trains at South Ferry/Whitehall St.
• Out-of-system transfer is available between South Ferry [1] [2] and Bowling Green [4] stations
(request a transfer ticket).

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

Or, transfer at 34 St-Herald Sq to an uptown [N] or [Q] for service to nearby 57 St-7 Av.

• To Roosevelt Island and 21 St-Queensbridge, take the [F] to Roosevelt Av and transfer to a
Coney Island-bound-bound [F].

• From these stations, take a Coney Island-bound [F] to 47-50 Sts and transfer to a Jamaica-bound [F].
